title: Typefaces on book cover
content:
Anyone knows which typefaces (the swashy didone and the other one) are these on this book cover?

[http://img.submarino.com.br/produtos/01/00/item/112578/9/112578923SZ.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012224920/http:/img.submarino.com.br/produtos/01/00/item/112578/9/112578923SZ.jpg "http://img.submarino.com.br/produtos/01/00/item/112578/9/112578923SZ.jpg")
author: Matheus D.

comments.content:
(again) [TheSerif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012224920/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Theserif) and can't remember the didone at the moment but will find it for sure!

EDIT: [Magnel/Magnola](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012224920/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/eimapas/magnola) by Eimantas Paškonis using some swash alternates / [U](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012224920/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/eimapas/magnola/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/514238/207), / [O](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012224920/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/eimapas/magnola/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/514238/143) and / [o](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012224920/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/eimapas/magnola/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/514238/557)
